page.title: 05Coombe Valley Campsite
page.content: This is a residential campsite. Average amount of years, people lived at the site is 6 years. Most people like it there because of the peace and quiet. Disadvantages of the area are:no bus routes nearby, you need transport to get into town. The most popular pets are cats and dogs. Most people like doing gardening and walking in their spare time. They like walking along the coast or around the beautiful countryside nearby. Altogether there are 36 caravans on the site. There are 19 men, 17 women and no children under the age of 16. Amenities:telephone, firehose, showers and toilets.
